body_html:
The security scan that halts our build flagged CVE-2017-5754. That page mentions meltdown.

That page links to the ubuntu wiki. The wiki page again asserts Meltdown is associated with CVE-2017-5754. That page also has a list of "Userspace Mitigations - Mitigations have been released for the following non-kernel packages". Exploring those, firefox (USN-3516-1) is has a reference to CVE-2017-5754.
body_text:
The security scan that halts our build flagged CVE-2017-5754.  That page mentions meltdown.
That page links to the ubuntu wiki.  The wiki page again asserts Meltdown is associated with CVE-2017-5754. That page also has a list of "Userspace Mitigations - Mitigations have been released for the following non-kernel packages".  Exploring those, firefox (USN-3516-1) is has a reference to CVE-2017-5754.
body:
The security scan that halts our build flagged [CVE-2017-5754](https://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2017/CVE-2017-5754.html).  That page mentions meltdown.

That page links to the[ ubuntu wiki](https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/SpectreAndMeltdown).  The wiki page again asserts Meltdown is associated with CVE-2017-5754. That page also has a list of "Userspace Mitigations - Mitigations have been released for the following non-kernel packages".  Exploring those, firefox ([USN-3516-1](https://usn.ubuntu.com/usn/usn-3516-1/)) is has a reference to CVE-2017-5754.
